TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether to allow or exclude database objects that match the pattern specified in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect> enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry> class to allow or exclude particular database objects during generation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect Allow = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Allow the entries that match the specified pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect Exclude = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Exclude the entries that match the specified pattern.
